General.Name: Chase Science Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Chase Science Co., Ltd. operates as an electronic payment IT solution provider. The company develops, sells, and services electronic payment IT systems. Its products are to provide merchants and banks with software and hardware products and services related to electronic payment. The company offers industry payment solutions and payment solutions for small and medium-sized merchants, including supermarkets, hospitals, scenic spots, hotels, transportation, tobacco, petroleum and petrochemicals, finance and non-taxation, etc.; and payment and industry-specific application software, self-service and POS terminals, scanning code devices, cloud speakers, and other products. It also provides support services. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

2.Name: Lan  Lin
2.Title: Deputy GM, Board Sec. & Non-Independent Director
